biotools.summary: FOBI (Food-Biomarker Ontology) an ontology to represent food intake data and associate it with metabolomic data. It is composed of  two interconnected sub-ontologies. One is a “Food Ontology” consisting of raw foods and prepared foods while the second is a “Biomarker Ontology” containing food intake biomarkers classified by their chemical classes.
